title: Adaptive Interactive Learning Environment Design: Language Proficiency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language comprehension skills and fundamental digital device usage abilities
context.additional_context: A learning environment designed for experienced professionals to apply language skills contextually, supported by customized learning through digital devices and interactive content

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform context-based language tasks provided by an adaptive learning system with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply effective communication strategies more than three times in an interactive simulation environment by analyzing language usage contexts.
Learners can creatively apply learned language structures to real-world work scenarios more than twice through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
